content: Are you tired of boring meals? Introducing the solution to your problem: our new Butter Chicken Bowl! Tender chicken smothered in a rich buttery sauce, served on a bed of fluffy rice and spiced with Indian flavors. It's so good, it'll make you say "Butter yes!" Use code BUTTERBOWL10 for a limited time 10% off. So, don't be a chicken, give it a try!
